title: "Prediction of age of onset of SCA3 and DRPLA by survival analysis using machine learning"
excerpt: "Machine learning was used to predict the age of onset of spinocerebellar degeneration in unaffected patients by predicting asymptomatic probability based on current age and genetic information. The approach yielded more accurate predictions compared to traditional analysis."
